A web of lies

London is very much alive, the Queen celebrates her Diamond Jubilee and the London Olympics is about to rear its extravagant head. In the midst of it all, Ellie is a young girl eager to jump into the newspaper business. Just as she begins her internship with the broadsheet THE EDGE; however, her father goes missing. She is thrown headfirst into a web of lies, and brought into conflict with ruthless business interests and corrupt politicians. With the aid of her younger sister, Charlotte, Ellie sets out to search for her absent father. What she finds however, will change her world forever... An exciting crime drama set in the present day where nothing is as it seems, corruption and deceit are the norm, and people are willing to do anything to get their way, Web of Lies is a story of love, danger and spiders.
